ActJudges Act
PrecisAppointment of the Honourable MURRAY SINCLAIR of Winnipeg, Manitoba, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Manitoba, as Commissioner of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of MURRAY SINCLAIR as Chairperson of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, effective July 1, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
